author: silviodonato
body:
## Fix of HLT names in DQM after JIRA-717 (backport of #13966 in 80X)

Hi all,
with JIRA-717 [1] we are changing the name of a few trigger paths.
This PR fix the DQM code accordingly.
Silvio.
[1] https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-717
title: Fix of HLT names in DQM after JIRA-717 (backport of #13966 in 80X)
